RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Splitmap Manager
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Vincent Voois [ http://tinyurl.com/vvrns ]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Extended split-map manager (drumkit generator): Assigns samples to multiple keys, shifts existing sample mappings, starts drum kits from different basenotes than C-4 and more. Can be found in the instrument list's context menu (right-click on an instrument).
